projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A portfolio website built with Next.js and TailwindCSS.

projects.title: Semantic Authenticator
projects.description: An experiment in embedding semantic AI into authentication.

projects.title: ClaimVision
projects.description: Flood damage claim management platform born from necessity. After my house flooded, I built the photo organization and documentation tool I wish I'd had. Features AI-powered analysis, drag-and-drop organization, and automated reporting.

projects.title: Seance Chain
projects.description: A blockchain-based collaborative messaging platform where users can 'summon' messages together and mint them as NFTs. Features gas-optimized smart contracts, comprehensive testing, and a haunted arcade UI theme.
